Login Template App Name Branding sentence describes your company or product Continue with Email Continue with Google Continue with Phone Sign Up with Email Sign In with Email Email Sign Up Sign In Password Forgot password? Have Account already? Sign in instead. Don't have Account? Sign up instead. Confirm Password Password should be at least 6 characters! Not a valid Email! Passwords don't match! Recover your Account Send Go back Login with Phone Verify your Number Phone Number Didn't receive Code? Send again. Send Code Verify Verification Code Not a valid Number You are offline! Code sent to %s Welcome This is a Login Template created by @ameencarpenter Main Components used: • Navigation (Standard)
• Jetpack compose
• Firebase Supported Login Methods: • Email
• Google
• Phone Number Simplicity is the ultimate sophistication Log out Show Password Hide Password
